mapper.insert:
parameterType : SQL실행하기 위해 제공되어야하는 객체 order: selectKey 부분을 SQL문 사용 뒤 혹은 그 전에 실행할지 정하는 것. dual: currval값을 가져오기 위해 실재 존재하지 않는 테이블을 넣는다. 그 다음 nextVal에 currVal값+1을 넣는다. Curval은 현재 연결에서의 최종 부여값이기 때문에 다른 연결이 nextVal했든 말든 상관없다.
select board_bno_seq.currval from dual
insert into board (bno, btitle, bcontent, bwriter, bdate,bpassword,bhitcount,boriginalfilename, bsavedfilename, bfilecontent) values (board_bno_seq.nextval, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bwriter},sysdate,#{bpassword}, 0, #{boriginalfilename},#{bsavedfilename},#{bfilecontent})
insert into board (bno, btitle, bcontent, bwriter, bdate,bpassword,bhitcount) values (board_bno_seq.nextval, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bwriter},sysdate,#{bpassword}, 0)
mapper.select: resultType: SQL 실행한 결과값 담을 객체 select bno as bid, btitle, bwriter as bowner, bdate, bhitcount from board order by bno desc
mapper.update: update board set bhitcount=#{bhitcount} where bno=#{bno}

update.if: update board set btitle=#{btitle},bcontent=#{bcontent}, bpassword=#{bpassword} ,bdate=sysdate, boriginalfilename=#{boriginalfilename}, bsavedfilename=#{bsavedfilename}, bfilecontent=#{bfilecontent} where bno=#{bno}
update board set btitle=#{btitle},bcontent=#{bcontent}, bpassword=#{bpassword} ,bdate=sysdate where bno=#{bno}
